tasks.task: Select and Plant Tomato Plants in Garden
subtasks: Observe plant health and discard unhealthy plants
Look for signs of disease or insect damage
Check for proper growth and straight stems
Examine tags to determine days to maturity and hardiness zone compatibility
Transplant tomato plants, removing lower branches and setting deeper than pot
Avoid plants with excessive blossoms or tomatoes to minimize stress
Prepare garden beds for tomato planting
Water and care for newly planted tomatoes
Monitor for disease and pest infestations
Prune plants to promote growth and health
Adjust watering and fertilizing schedules as needed
Collect tomatoes for use in cooking
Decorate kitchen table with freshly picked tomatoes
